_comment: ADS8320 - 16-bit, 100 kSPS SAR ADC from Texas Instruments
description: ADS8320 16-bit, 100 kSPS SAR ADC, ultra-low power, differential input, SPI interface
_comment_V_FS: Full scale voltage, V (differential input range: -V_ref to +V_ref, typical V_ref = 2.5V, so V_FS = 5.0V)
_comment_ENOB: Effective number of bits (typical for 16-bit ADC)
_comment_power_consumption_100kSPS: Power consumption at 100 kSPS, W (1.95 mW)
_comment_input_range: Differential input voltage range (typically V_ref = 2.5V, so range is -2.5V to +2.5V)
_comment_reference_voltage: Typical reference voltage, V (V_ref, can be configured)
